rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, you've gathered some
nice firewood there.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0002
rows.name:
With this,
we can cook some delicious rice.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0003
rows.name: Cook...rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0004
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0005
rows.name:
That's why I asked you to get firewood
and find a good spot for cooking.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0006
rows.name:
What are you going to
do with the cooked rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0007
rows.name: What're you gonna do with the rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0008
rows.name:
What do you intend to do
with the cooked rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0009
rows.name:
And what's the plan
with this rice cooking?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0010
rows.name:
What do you think we're
going to do with it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0011
rows.name: We're going to eat it, of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey, Yoshitsune,
have you prepared everything?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, yes, I have all the tools,
seasonings, and even the script
everything is ready.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0014
rows.name:
Huh? Yoshitsune is cooking the rice?
Then what about Benkei?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0015
rows.name:
Heheh,
I specialize in eating!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0016
rows.name:
Ah, I see.
Well, I guess that makes sense...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0017
rows.name:
You shouldn't expect any cooking
skills from my younger sister.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0018
rows.name:
My younger sister isn't good at
anything except collecting weapons
and keeping things tidy.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0019
rows.name:
Shut up! Stop saying unnecessary things
and hurry up and cook the rice!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0020
rows.name:
Yes, yes...
Such a demanding sister I have...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0021
rows.name: Though I guess that's part of her charm.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0022
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0023
rows.name: So what, are we eating... just rice?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0024
rows.name: Did you say she's good at... tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0025
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0026
rows.name: Uh, are we eating just rice? That's it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0027
rows.name: Hang on, she's good at tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0028
rows.name: What shall I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0029
rows.name: Is this meal to consist of rice alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0030
rows.name: Did you say she is good at tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0031
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0032
rows.name: So we're having just rice? That's it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0033
rows.name: What was that about tidying up?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0101
rows.name:
Good point.
Rice by itself is pretty tasteless,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0102
rows.name:
Hmph...
Hikari, you're still such a child.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0103
rows.name: Yoshitsune, what about that thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0104
rows.name: Yes, I have it ready and waiting.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0105
rows.name:
Ohhh, yes, this is it!
They're pickled to perfection!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0106
rows.name: What are these things?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0107
rows.name: Umeboshi!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0108
rows.name: Umebo...?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0109
rows.name: So they're edible...are they?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0110
rows.name: Umebo...?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0111
rows.name: Never heard of those before...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0112
rows.name: Umeboshi...?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0113
rows.name:
What is that?
Are you saying it's food?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0114
rows.name: Umebo...?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0115
rows.name:
What's that?
Is it somethin' to eat?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0116
rows.name:
These are preserved fruits
pickled in salt.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0117
rows.name:
What we do is, we wrap them up in
the sticky rice and make omusubi.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0118
rows.name: And it tastes absolutely amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0119
rows.name:
I know what omusubi are, but
are umeboshi really tasty?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0120
rows.name:
Yeah, they're delicious.
Want to try one?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0121
rows.name: Ugh, it's kind of soft...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0122
rows.name:
Hmm?
...So sour!!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0123
rows.name:
Quick, give me some water!
Water!!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0124
rows.name: What is this thing!?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0125
rows.name:
Is this really food!?
It's not poison, is it?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0126
rows.name:
Ahahahahah!
Of course it's not poison!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0127
rows.name:
Actually, they have antibacterial
properties and are quite healthy
for you.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0128
rows.name:
Geez, why doesn't anyone
understand how delicious these are?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0130
rows.name:
Eating umebosh onigiri under the blue
sky... It can't get any better
than that!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0131
rows.name:
How about it, Driver?
Want to give one a try?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0201
rows.name:
What's that face for?
You seem surprised by something.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0202
rows.name: Well, it is surprising...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0203
rows.name:
What's that supposed to mean!
What's wrong with me being good
at tidying up!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0204
rows.name: Calm down, Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0205
rows.name:
Truth is, despite appearances,
my younger sister is actually
quite meticulous...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0206
rows.name:
She gets uncomfortable if things
aren't in their designated places.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0207
rows.name:
And she has to arrange her weapon
collection from smallest to largest
or she won't be satisfied.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0208
rows.name:
She's really particular
about many things.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0209
rows.name: Hey, Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0210
rows.name:
With your personality,
isn't it strange
that you're so meticulous?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0211
rows.name: Huh!?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0212
rows.name:
Hikari, are you
trying to pick a fight with me!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0213
rows.name:
Oh, I get it now.
Hikari must be one of those people.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0214
rows.name:
You're one of those girls who can't
keep things tidy, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0215
rows.name:
Ugh...
Th-that's not... true!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0216
rows.name:
Oh yeah, there are plenty of those.
Girls who act cute but
are actually slobs.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0217
rows.name:
That type is the absolute worst
to deal with.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0218
rows.name:
Right, Driver?
You agree with me, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0219
rows.name: Huh? Well... I mean...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0220
rows.name:
I suppose I do prefer people
who keep things tidy...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0221
rows.name: Yeah, that's what most people prefer.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0222
rows.name:
But I'm not very good
at tidying up either.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0223
rows.name: That's true.

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0224
rows.name:
Being unable to keep things in order
is a sign of a disturbed mind...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0225
rows.name:
Well...
I guess...

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0226
rows.name:
Wouldn't most people prefer someone
who keeps things tidy?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0227
rows.name:
Sh-shut up!
Don't take the question so seriously!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0228
rows.name:
Well, Hikari? Ready to apologize
and admit you're wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0229
rows.name:
I could teach you
the secrets of proper tidying sometime?

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0230
rows.name: I absolutely refuse!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0231
rows.name:
Ahahaha!
Don't blame me if Rex
starts to dislike you!

rows.label: kizunatalk050_msg0232
rows.name: Grrr...
